## Testing Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an 'x' -->

- [ ] I have tested this locally with `bun run dev`
- [ ] I have run `bun run build` and it completes successfully
- [ ] I have run `bun run astro check` (if code changes were made)

## Content Checklist (if adding events/organizers)

- [ ] All required fields are filled in
- [ ] Event/organizer details are accurate
- [ ] Dates and times are in the correct format
- [ ] Organizer ID exists (for events)
- [ ] File is in the correct directory
- [ ] File name follows naming conventions

## Code Quality Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation (if needed)
